titleStmt.title: [The fantasy of the passyon of the fox]

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted by me Wynkyn de Worde,
publicationStmt.date: the. xvi. day of February. The yere of our lorde M.v.C.xxx. [1530]]

notesStmt.note: Colophon: Thus is ended the fantasy of the passyon of the fox, lately of the town of Myre, a lytell besyde Shaftesbury in the dyoceses of Salysbury.
Aiir begins: Amyddes Nouember that moneth mysty.
Imperfect: A1, title page, lacking (title supplied from colophon); print show-through; pages marked and stained.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
